org.taverna.server.master.rest

Interface TavernaServerSecurityREST


  • @RolesAllowed(value="ROLE_tavernauser")
public interface TavernaServerSecurityREST
    Manages the security of the workflow run. In general, only the owner of a run may access this resource. Many of these security-related resources may only be changed before the run is set to operating.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  TavernaServerSecurityREST.CredentialHolder
      A container for a credential, used to work around issues with type inference in CXF's REST service handling and JAXB.
      static class  TavernaServerSecurityREST.CredentialList
      A simple list of credential descriptions.
      static class  TavernaServerSecurityREST.Descriptor
      A description of the security resources associated with a workflow run.
      static interface  TavernaServerSecurityREST.PathNames 
      static class  TavernaServerSecurityREST.PermissionDescription
      An instruction to update the permissions for a user.
      static class  TavernaServerSecurityREST.PermissionsDescription
      A description of the permissions granted to others by the owner of a workflow run.
      static class  TavernaServerSecurityREST.TrustList
      A simple list of trusted certificate descriptions.

      • describe

        @GET
 @Path(value="/")
 @Produces(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Nonnull
TavernaServerSecurityREST.Descriptor describe(@Nonnull @Context
                                                                                                                                        javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo ui)
        Gets a description of the security information supported by the workflow run.
        Parameters:
        ui - About the URI used to access this resource.
        Returns:
        A description of the security information.

      • getParticularCredential

        @GET
 @Path(value="credentials/{id}")
 @Produces(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Nonnull
TavernaServerSecurityREST.CredentialHolder getParticularCredential(@Nonnull @PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                                            String id)
                                                                                                                                                                     throws NoCredentialException
        Describe a particular credential.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the credential to fetch.
        Returns:
        The description of the credential.
        Throws:
        NoCredentialException - If the credential doesn't exist.

      • setParticularCredential

        @PUT
 @Path(value="credentials/{id}")
 @Consumes(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Produces(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Nonnull
TavernaServerSecurityREST.CredentialHolder setParticularCredential(@Nonnull @PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     String id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     @Nonnull
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     TavernaServerSecurityREST.CredentialHolder c,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     @Nonnull @Context
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo ui)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              throws InvalidCredentialException,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     BadStateChangeException
        Update a particular credential.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the credential to update.
        c - The details of the credential to use in the update.
        ui - Information about the URI used to access this resource.
        Returns:
        Description of the updated credential.
        Throws:
        InvalidCredentialException - If the credential description isn't valid.
        BadStateChangeException - If the workflow run is not in the initialising state.

      • addCredential

        @POST
 @Path(value="credentials")
 @Consumes(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Nonnull
javax.ws.rs.core.Response addCredential(@Nonnull

                                                                                                                                             BadStateChangeException
        Adds a new credential.
        Parameters:
        c - The details of the credential to create.
        ui - Information about the URI used to access this resource.
        Returns:
        Description of the created credential.
        Throws:
        InvalidCredentialException - If the credential description isn't valid.
        BadStateChangeException - If the workflow run is not in the initialising state.

      • deleteAllCredentials

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="credentials")
 @Nonnull
javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteAllCredentials(@Nonnull @Context
                                                                                             javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo ui)
                                                                                      throws BadStateChangeException
        Deletes all credentials associated with a run.
        Parameters:
        ui - Information about the URI used to access this resource.
        Returns:
        A characterisation of a successful delete.
        Throws:
        BadStateChangeException - If the workflow run is not in the initialising state.

TavernaServerSecurityREST.PermissionsDescription describePermissions(@Nonnull @Context
                                                                                                                                                                         javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo ui)
        Parameters:
        ui - Information about the URI used to access this resource.
        Returns:
        A list of (non-default) permissions associated with this workflow run.

      • describePermission

        @GET
 @Path(value="permissions/{id}")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
Permission describePermission(@Nonnull @PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                             String id)
        Describe the particular permission granted to a user.
        Parameters:
        id - The name of the user whose permissions are to be described.
        Returns:
        The permission they are granted.

      • setPermission

        @PUT
 @Consumes(value="text/plain")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Path(value="permissions/{id}")
 @Nonnull
Permission setPermission(@Nonnull @PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                                       String id,
                                                                                                                                       @Nonnull
                                                                                                                                       Permission perm)
        Update the permission granted to a user.
        Parameters:
        id - The name of the user whose permissions are to be updated. Note that the owner always has full permissions.
        perm - The permission level to set.
        Returns:
        The permission level that has actually been set.

      • deletePermission

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="permissions/{id}")
 @Nonnull
javax.ws.rs.core.Response deletePermission(@Nonnull @PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                              String id,
                                                                                              @Nonnull @Context
                                                                                              javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo ui)
        Delete the permissions associated with a user, which restores them to the default (no access unless they are the owner or have admin privileges).
        Parameters:
        id - The name of the user whose permissions are to be revoked.
        ui - Information about the URI used to access this resource.
        Returns:
        An indication that the delete has been successful (or not).

      • makePermission

        @POST
 @Path(value="permissions")
 @Consumes(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Nonnull
javax.ws.rs.core.Response makePermission(@Nonnull
                                                                                                                                              TavernaServerSecurityREST.PermissionDescription desc,
                                                                                                                                              @Nonnull @Context
                                                                                                                                              javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo ui)
        Manufacture a permission setting for a previously-unknown user.
        Parameters:
        desc - A description of the name of the user and the permission level to grant them.
        ui - Information about the URI used to access this resource.
        Returns:
        An indication that the create has been successful (or not).
